description: Sample Dashboard for Ops Center Analyzer Adapter

options.content:
# ${__dashboard}

Sample Dashboard for Ops Center Analyzer Adapter

## All Storage Systems Report

Compare all storage systems

targets.query: SELECT max("sum_of_total_io_per_sec") AS "Total IOPS" FROM "storage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance_name"::tag fill(none)

panels.description: Average response time per storage system

targets.query:
SELECT
    max("avg_of_response_time_in_micro_sec")
FROM(
        SELECT
            ("avg_of_read_response_time_in_micro_sec" + "avg_of_write_response_time_in_micro_sec") / 2 AS "avg_of_response_time_in_micro_sec"
        FROM
            "storage"
    )
WHERE
    $timeFilter
GROUP BY
    time($__interval),
    "instance_name"::tag
fill(none)

panels.title: Response Time

panels.description: Total transfer rate per storage system

targets.query: SELECT max("sum_of_total_transfer_mebibytes_per_sec") AS "Total Transfer Rate" FROM "storage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance_name"::tag fill(none)

panels.title: Transfer Rate

panels.description: Total pool usage per storage system

targets.query:
SELECT
    last("sum_of_pool_physical_usage_in_percent") AS "Total Pool Usage"
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            "sum_of_pool_physical_usage_in_gibibyte" / "sum_of_pool_total_physical_capacity_in_gibibyte" * 100 AS "sum_of_pool_physical_usage_in_percent"
        FROM
            "storage"
        )
WHERE
    $timeFilter
GROUP BY
    time($__interval),
    "instance_name"::tag
fill(none)

panels.title: Pool Usage

options.content:
## Selected Storage System Report

Analyze resources of the selected storage system (${Storage})

targets.query: SELECT max("sum_of_total_io_per_sec") AS "Total IOPS" FROM "storage" WHERE ("instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance_name"::tag fill(none)

SELECT max("avg_of_read_response_time_in_micro_sec") AS "Average Read Response Time", max("avg_of_write_response_time_in_micro_sec") AS "Average Write Response Time" FROM "storage" WHERE ("instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance_name"::tag fill(none)

SELECT max("sum_of_total_transfer_mebibytes_per_sec") AS "Total Transfer Rate" FROM "storage" WHERE ("instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance_name"::tag fill(none)

SELECT
    last("sum_of_pool_physical_usage_in_percent") AS "Total Pool Usage"
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            "sum_of_pool_physical_usage_in_gibibyte" / "sum_of_pool_total_physical_capacity_in_gibibyte" * 100 AS "sum_of_pool_physical_usage_in_percent"
        FROM
            "storage"
        )
WHERE
        $timeFilter
        AND "instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/
GROUP BY
    time($__interval),
    "instance_name"::tag
fill(none)

SELECT max("busy_rate_in_percent") AS "Busy Rate" FROM "storage_processor" WHERE ("instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/ AND "processor_name"::tag =~ /^$Processor$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance_name"::tag, "processor_name"::tag fill(none)

SELECT max("cache_write_pending_in_percent") AS "Cache Write Pending Rate" FROM "storage_cache_per_processor" WHERE ("instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/ AND "processor_name"::tag =~ /^$Processor$/ AND "cache_number"::tag =~ /^$Cache$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance_name"::tag, "processor_name"::tag, "cache_number"::tag fill(none)

SELECT max("peak_of_transfer_mebibytes_per_sec") AS "Peak Transfer Rate" FROM "storage_port" WHERE ("instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/ AND "port_name"::tag =~ /^$worst_avg_xfer_port$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance_name"::tag, "port_name"::tag fill(none)

panels.description: Sum of capacity of the selected pools

targets.query:
SELECT
    max("total_physical_total_capacity_in_gbytes") as "Phys. Total",
    max("total_subscription_capacity_in_gbytes") as "Subscription",
    max("total_physical_used_capacity_in_gbytes") as "Phys. Used"
FROM
(
        SELECT
            sum("subscribed_capacity_in_gibibyte") as "total_subscription_capacity_in_gbytes",
            sum("physical_usage_in_gibibyte") as "total_physical_used_capacity_in_gbytes",
            sum("total_physical_capacity_in_gibibyte") as "total_physical_total_capacity_in_gbytes"
        FROM
            "storage_pool"
        WHERE
            "instance_name" =~ /^$Storage$/
            AND "pool_display_name" =~ /^$Pool$/
        GROUP BY
            "instance_name"
    )
WHERE
    $timeFilter
GROUP BY
    time($__interval)
fill(none)

panels.title: Pool Capacity

targets.query:
SELECT
    last("physical_usage_in_percent") AS "Pool Usage"
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            "physical_usage_in_gibibyte" / "total_physical_capacity_in_gibibyte" * 100 as "physical_usage_in_percent"
        FROM
            "storage_pool"
        )
WHERE
    "instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/
    AND "pool_display_name"::tag =~ /^$worst_usage_pool$/
    AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY
    time($__interval),
    "instance_name"::tag,
    "pool_display_name"::tag
fill(none)

panels.description: Average IOPS during the selected time range

targets.query: SELECT mean("sum_of_total_io_per_sec") AS "Total", mean("sum_of_read_io_per_sec") AS "Read", mean("sum_of_write_io_per_sec") AS "Write" FROM "storage_pool" WHERE ("instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/ AND "pool_display_name"::tag =~ /^$worst_usage_pool$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance_name"::tag, "pool_display_name"::tag

panels.title: IOPS (All Pools)

targets.query: SELECT max("sum_of_total_io_per_sec") AS "Total" FROM "storage_pool" WHERE ("instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/ AND "pool_display_name"::tag =~ /^$worst_iops_pool$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance_name"::tag, "pool_display_name"::tag fill(none)

panels.description: Average IOPS during the selected time range

targets.query:
SELECT
    mean("total_io_per_sec") AS "Total",
    mean("read_io_per_sec") AS "Read",
    mean("write_io_per_sec") AS "Write"   
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            ("read_io_per_sec" + "write_io_per_sec") AS "total_io_per_sec", 
            "read_io_per_sec",
            "write_io_per_sec"
        FROM
            "storage_ldev"
        WHERE
            "instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/
    )
WHERE
    $timeFilter
GROUP BY
    "instance_name"::tag,
    "ldev_number"::tag

panels.title: IOPS (All Volumes)

targets.query:
SELECT
    max("total_io_per_sec") AS "Total"
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            "read_io_per_sec" + "write_io_per_sec" AS "total_io_per_sec"
        FROM
            "storage_ldev"
        WHERE
            "instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/
            AND "ldev_number"::tag =~ /^$Volume$/
            AND $timeFilter
        )
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY
    time($__interval),
    "instance_name"::tag,
    "ldev_number"::tag
fill(none)

panels.description: Average response time during the selected time range

targets.query: SELECT mean("read_response_time_in_micro_sec") AS "Read", mean("write_response_time_in_micro_sec") AS "Write" FROM "storage_ldev" WHERE ("instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance_name"::tag, "ldev_number"::tag

panels.title: Response Time (All Volumes)

panels.description: Response time of the selected volumes

targets.query: SELECT max("read_response_time_in_micro_sec") AS "Read", max("write_response_time_in_micro_sec") AS "Write" FROM "storage_ldev" WHERE ("instance_name"::tag =~ /^$Storage$/ AND "ldev_number"::tag =~ /^$Volume$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance_name"::tag, "ldev_number"::tag fill(none)

panels.title: Volume Response Time

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage" WITH KEY = "instance_name" WHERE $timeFilter
list.name: Storage
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage" WITH KEY = "instance_name" WHERE $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage_processor" WITH KEY ="processor_name" WHERE "instance_name" =~ /^${Storage}$/ AND $timeFilter
list.name: Processor
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage_processor" WITH KEY ="processor_name" WHERE "instance_name" =~ /^${Storage}$/ AND $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage_cache_per_processor" WITH KEY ="cache_number" WHERE "instance_name" =~ /^${Storage}$/ AND $timeFilter
list.name: Cache
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage_cache_per_processor" WITH KEY ="cache_number" WHERE "instance_name" =~ /^${Storage}$/ AND $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage_port" WITH KEY ="port_name" WHERE "instance_name" =~ /^${Storage}$/ AND $timeFilter
list.name: Port
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage_port" WITH KEY ="port_name" WHERE "instance_name" =~ /^${Storage}$/ AND $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage_pool" WITH KEY ="pool_display_name" WHERE "instance_name" =~ /^${Storage}$/ AND $timeFilter
list.name: Pool
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage_pool" WITH KEY ="pool_display_name" WHERE "instance_name" =~ /^${Storage}$/ AND $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage_ldev" WITH KEY ="ldev_number" WHERE "instance_name" =~ /^${Storage}$/ AND $timeFilter
list.name: Volume
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "storage_ldev" WITH KEY ="ldev_number" WHERE "instance_name" =~ /^${Storage}$/ AND $timeFilter

list.definition:
SELECT
    "pool_display_name"
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            "pool_display_name",
            top("max_total_total_iops", $top_count)
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    max("sum_of_total_io_per_sec") as "max_total_total_iops"
                FROM
                    "storage_pool"
                WHERE
                    $timeFilter
                    AND instance_name =~ /$Storage/
                    AND pool_display_name =~ /$Pool/
                GROUP BY
                    "instance_name",
                    "pool_display_name"
            )
    )
list.name: worst_iops_pool
list.query:
SELECT
    "pool_display_name"
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            "pool_display_name",
            top("max_total_total_iops", $top_count)
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    max("sum_of_total_io_per_sec") as "max_total_total_iops"
                FROM
                    "storage_pool"
                WHERE
                    $timeFilter
                    AND instance_name =~ /$Storage/
                    AND pool_display_name =~ /$Pool/
                GROUP BY
                    "instance_name",
                    "pool_display_name"
            )
    )

list.definition:
SELECT
    "port_name"
FROM
(
        SELECT
            "port_name",
            top("worst_xfer_rate", $top_count)
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    max("avg_of_transfer_mebibytes_per_sec") as "worst_xfer_rate"
                FROM
                    "storage_port"
                WHERE
                    $timeFilter
                    AND "instance_name" =~ /^$Storage$/
                    AND "port_name" =~ /^$Port$/
                GROUP BY
                    "instance_name",
                    "port_name"
            )
    )
list.name: worst_avg_xfer_port
list.query:
SELECT
    "port_name"
FROM
(
        SELECT
            "port_name",
            top("worst_xfer_rate", $top_count)
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    max("avg_of_transfer_mebibytes_per_sec") as "worst_xfer_rate"
                FROM
                    "storage_port"
                WHERE
                    $timeFilter
                    AND "instance_name" =~ /^$Storage$/
                    AND "port_name" =~ /^$Port$/
                GROUP BY
                    "instance_name",
                    "port_name"
            )
    )

list.definition:
SELECT
    "pool_display_name"
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            "pool_display_name",
            top("max_physical_usage_percent", $top_count)
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    max("physical_usage_in_percent") as "max_physical_usage_percent"
                FROM
                    (
                        SELECT
                            "physical_usage_in_gibibyte" / "total_physical_capacity_in_gibibyte" * 100 as "physical_usage_in_percent"
                        FROM
                            "storage_pool"
                        )
                WHERE
                    $timeFilter
                    AND instance_name =~ /$Storage/
                    AND pool_display_name =~ /$Pool/
                GROUP BY
                    "instance_name",
                    "pool_display_name"
            )
    )
list.name: worst_usage_pool
list.query:
SELECT
    "pool_display_name"
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            "pool_display_name",
            top("max_physical_usage_percent", $top_count)
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    max("physical_usage_in_percent") as "max_physical_usage_percent"
                FROM
                    (
                        SELECT
                            "physical_usage_in_gibibyte" / "total_physical_capacity_in_gibibyte" * 100 as "physical_usage_in_percent"
                        FROM
                            "storage_pool"
                        )
                WHERE
                    $timeFilter
                    AND instance_name =~ /$Storage/
                    AND pool_display_name =~ /$Pool/
                GROUP BY
                    "instance_name",
                    "pool_display_name"
            )
    )

title: Hitachi VSP One Block
